quoteText:
<li>Any release of private or personal information is not permitted under any circumstances.
This includes addresses, locations, or IP addresses.
title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

tosdr.case: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
tosdr.tldr: As the forum is rather technical Spigot doesn't have a dedicated page to do so, but if a thread for disclosing personal info is reported, it will be removed or closed and the users warned.
